column5: Going to my sisters for thanks giving dinner and just found out she cancelled her sattelite service....Anyone know of a link to watch it?
You can listen to it on channel 88 sirus.  Also Justin TV
At 1 PM you can listen to the MRN broadcast.  http://m.motorracingnetwork.com
Awesome..I would gladly for just about any other race but Dega has the cat beat hands down.. Go Blue Deuce baby!

Terry great idea....However this is a soft spot for me big time..I bought a LG PVR for that purpose only....Now for some reason, since upgrading to HD it will only record for about 2 hours then I get a thing that pops up that says record blocking signals detected...Then the screen goes black....LG wont do anything about it..Says its my shaw provider....
that sucks   can you do a manual record and set it to record it in 1.5 hour segments
Wonder why it let's you go to the 2 hour mark?.
I called shaw about it..They say its a signal TSN puts out that gets picked up by certian recivers I happen to own one of them..
if anyone else is interested..Heres the link.. Streams 2 3 or 4 will work..  www.fstreaming96.blogspot.de
I listened to the race using my Sirius iPhone app and watched the last 5 laps on TSN.  Wow. Quite the finish.
